latest news.eng_title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2's first post-launch update drops this week
latest news.summary: Focus Entertainment has announced that the first post-launch update for Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 will be released this week. The patch will address persistent crashing issues, optimize performance, and fix a bug that has prevented some players from joining multiplayer matches. According to a Steam post, the bug has caused players to get stuck on 'Joining Server' and lose out on rewards after being disconnected from the server. The update will also include private PvE lobbies, ultrawide support, and the Battle Barge Sparring Arena. A post-launch roadmap has been shared, which includes several free updates, including Season 2 in Fall 2024, featuring new PvE missions, a new lethal difficulty, and new cosmetics.
latest news.title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2's first post-launch update drops this week

latest news.eng_title: SpaceX Launches Polaris Dawn Into Orbit: What to Know About the Mission
latest news.summary: SpaceX launched the Polaris Dawn mission into orbit on Tuesday, using a Falcon 9 rocket to carry four private astronauts on a five-day journey. The mission, backed by billionaire Jared Isaacman, aims to test laser-based communications with Starlink and pave the way for travel to Mars. The crew, which includes Isaacman, SpaceX's Sarah Gillis, Scott Poteet, and Anna Menon, will attempt the first spacewalk of private astronauts and test the limits of human endurance. The spacecraft will travel to an altitude of up to 870 miles above Earth, the highest orbit ever recorded. As Musk said, 'Crew safety is absolutely paramount and this mission carries more risk than usual, as it will be the furthest humans have traveled from Earth since Apollo and the first commercial spacewalk!' The mission is a follow-up to the 2021 Inspiration4 mission and is expected to be the first of three missions using SpaceX's new Starship rocket.
latest news.title: SpaceX Launches Polaris Dawn Into Orbit: What to Know About the Mission

latest news.eng_title: SpaceX's Polaris Dawn Mission: A New Era in Private Space Exploration
latest news.summary: SpaceX, led by Elon Musk, successfully launched the first Polaris mission to new heights of private space exploration. The mission, Polaris Dawn, has been in preparation for two years and has been delayed several times. The four astronauts on board, Jared Isaacman, Sara Girolamo, Anna Menon, and Scott 'Kid' Tackett, will travel further and higher than any previous orbital mission and will be the first to take a civilian tourist into space. The crew will wear new SpaceX spacesuits because the Dragon spacecraft does not have a hatch. Isaacman and Girolamo will exit the spacecraft through an open door and perform a spacewalk. The mission was delayed twice in the past two weeks due to a helium leak and bad weather. The Dragon spacecraft will spend five to six days in space and needs good weather for a safe landing. The Falcon 9 rocket successfully launched from Cape Canaveral on Tuesday morning and the first stage returned to Earth and landed on the Just Read the Instructions platform. The mission's first goal is to reach the highest low-Earth orbit in history, surpassing the Apollo missions. The second and main goal is a spacewalk, scheduled for Thursday, September 12. 'This is a historic moment for private space exploration,' said Elon Musk in a live broadcast on his X network. 'We're pushing the boundaries of what's possible and making space travel more accessible to everyone.'
latest news.title: Компания Маска SpaceX успешно запустила первую миссию Polaris к новым высотам частного освоения космоса

latest news.eng_title: SpaceX Postpones Polaris Dawn Launch Due to Weather Conditions
latest news.summary: SpaceX has postponed the launch of the Polaris Dawn mission due to poor weather conditions. According to a statement published on the company's X page, the launch of the Falcon 9 rocket with the Crew Dragon capsule and the Polaris Dawn crew is now scheduled for 05:23 local time (12:23 MSK). The original launch time was 03:00 local time (10:00 MSK) from the Kennedy Space Center in Florida. The Polaris Dawn mission will be the first crewed spaceflight to the International Space Station with non-professional astronauts. The crew will be led by Jared Isaacman, the founder and CEO of Shift4 Payments, who previously participated in the Inspiration4 mission. The mission also includes pilot Scott Poteet, a retired US Air Force colonel, and engineers Sarah Gillis and Anna Menon. SpaceX's CEO, Elon Musk, has announced plans to send the first Starship missions to Mars in two years, with the goal of establishing a self-sustaining city on the planet within 20 years.
latest news.title: SpaceX перенесла запуск миссии Polaris Dawn

latest news.eng_title: SpaceX Launches Polaris Dawn Mission for First Private Spaceflight
latest news.summary: SpaceX launched its Polaris Dawn mission early Tuesday morning, which will last several days and transport a crew of four members, marking a new step in the commercial exploration of space. The launch of the SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket, initially scheduled for 03:38 am (07:38 GMT), finally took place near two hours later from the Kennedy Space Center, after being delayed several times in the past two weeks due to bad weather. The mission commander, Jared Isaacman, a US billionaire who has been collaborating with Elon Musk's company for several years and partially financing the trip, aims to test the first space suits designed by the company, which are white and have a futuristic look, as one of the main objectives.
latest news.title: Polaris Dawn: lancement de la mission de SpaceX pour la première sortie spatiale privée

latest news.eng_title: SpaceX Launches Polaris Dawn Mission for First Private Spaceflight
latest news.summary: SpaceX launched its ambitious Polaris Dawn mission on Tuesday morning, which will last several days and transport a crew of four members, marking a new step in commercial space exploration. The launch of the SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket, initially scheduled for 03:38 am (07:38 GMT), finally took place near two hours later from the Kennedy Space Center. The launch had been postponed several times in the past two weeks due to bad weather. The mission commander, Jared Isaacman, a US billionaire who has been collaborating with Elon Musk's company for several years and partially financing the trip (amount not disclosed), aims to test the first space suits designed by the company, which are white and have a futuristic look. 'We will have more information on BFM Business in a few minutes. You can also follow the live coverage of BFM Business in video and on Twitter.'
latest news.title: Polaris Dawn: décollage de la mission de SpaceX pour la première sortie spatiale privée

latest news.eng_title: Space Marine 2's first post-launch update: Early patch notes
latest news.summary: Focus Interactive has announced the first post-launch update for Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2, targeting major performance issues including crashes and hardware stress. According to the Steam post, the update should offer multiple crash fixes, improvements to CPU overheat issues, server improvements, and render bug fixes. The update aims to improve the multiplayer experience, which relies heavily on PVP and co-op modes. The release date for the update is 'this week', with full patch notes to be announced when available.
latest news.title: Space Marine 2's first post-launch update: Early patch notes

latest news.eng_title: Space Marine 2 Details First Big Update
latest news.summary: The developer of Warhammer 40K: Space Marine 2, Saber Interactive, has announced the first major update for the game, which will address crashing and server issues, as well as provide crash fixes, server improvements, visual bug fixes, and fixes to CPU overheating issues. The update is expected to release sometime this week. Additionally, the game's second season will begin in October and will include new content, such as a new enemy type, more difficulty settings, and a brand-new Operations map. As stated by the developers, the update is intended to resolve the core issues that players have been experiencing, including significant server and matchmaking issues. 'It's a great day for Space Marine 2 players,' said the developers, 'as we're excited to bring these improvements to the game.'
latest news.title: Space Marine 2 Details First Big Update

latest news.eng_title: eFootball v4.0.0 2025 Update: New Features and Improvements
latest news.summary: Konami is set to release a new update for the eFootball v4.0.0 game in 2025, which will bring new features and improvements to the gaming experience. The update will be available on October 15, 2023, and will include improvements in graphics, user interface, and social links within the game. According to Konami, this update is a step towards improving the gaming experience and attracting more users. Additionally, Konami has launched a special offer that allows players to get 1500 free coins, which can be used to strengthen their team and get special players. The game PES Mobile eFootball 2025 will be released on October 20, 2023, and will include new features and improvements. The update requires a suitable storage space on devices, and Konami is working to provide all the details related to the update size to facilitate the download process for players.
latest news.title: تفاصيل جديدة حول تحديث eFootball v4.0.0 2025 وموعد الإطلاق

latest news.eng_title: Mirthwood Post-Launch Roadmap 2024/25: Update Schedule, Content & Details
latest news.summary: Bad Ridge Games has released a post-launch roadmap for their game Mirthwood, which includes updates and new content for the game's PC version. The roadmap outlines the developer's plans for the game's release, including hotfixes and patch updates, localization, and additional controller support. In October 2024, the 'Fish Are Friends' update will add a fishing mechanic, housing upgrades, and a companion system. The 'Death and Taxes' update in November 2024 will include funeral activities, new in-game quests, and generated quests. The 'The Feast and Festivities' update in December 2024 will add timed events, seasonal content, and a Steam Deck verified status. In Q1 and Q2 2025, the game will receive Quality of Life updates, new content, and features, including the Baby Boom update, which will add marriage and family features.
latest news.title: Mirthwood Post-Launch Roadmap 2024/25: Update Schedule, Content & Details

news knowledge.eng_title: An Eternity of War Awaits as Space Marine 2's Post-Launch Roadmap Is Revealed
news knowledge.summary: The post-launch roadmap for Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 has been revealed, promising additional Operation maps, harder difficulties, a Horde Mode, and new xenos abominations to vanquish. The game's developer, Saber, has stated that all meaningful gameplay additions will be available as free updates, with Season 1 focusing on community feedback and patches. Season 2, starting in October, will introduce a new Operations map, enemy type, difficulty level, and more. Seasons 3 and 4, arriving in 2025, will add to the game's longevity with further additions, including Horde Mode. According to Saber, 'all meaningful gameplay additions to the game will arrive as free updates.'
news knowledge.title: An Eternity of War Awaits as Space Marine 2's Post-Launch Roadmap Is Revealed

news knowledge.eng_title: Space Marine 2 DLC: Post-launch roadmap reveals Horde mode, new cosmetics, more
news knowledge.summary: The post-launch roadmap for Space Marine 2 has been revealed, outlining four seasons of content updates from September 2024 to 2025. Season 1 will launch on September 9, 2024, and will include free updates such as ultrawide support and private PVE lobbies, as well as premium cosmetic content. Future seasons will introduce new enemy types, game modes, and PVE missions, with a focus on maintaining the game's replayability. Focus Entertainment has committed to long-term post-launch support to ensure the game's longevity. As the devs explained, 'In the first weeks after launch, we'll focus on collecting your feedback across all community channels to bring some quick adjustments and improvements through quick patches.'
news knowledge.title: Space Marine 2 DLC: Post-launch roadmap reveals Horde mode, new cosmetics, more

news knowledge.eng_title: Android 15 Update: Google to Release New Features in October 2024
news knowledge.summary: Google has been working on its new Android 15 update, which is expected to be released in October 2024. The update will bring several new features, including battery health percentage, a private space to hide sensitive apps, lock-screen widgets, and support for Bluetooth OARAKAS. According to Google, the update will first be available on Google Pixel 9 Series smartphones, followed by other brands like OnePlus and Samsung. The exact release date in October is not confirmed, but it is expected to be in mid-October. Android users have been waiting for this update for a long time, and it is expected to change the way they use their smartphones.
news knowledge.title: बदल जाएगा फोन चलाने का अंदाज, अक्टूबर में आ रहा Android 15, मिलेंगे नए फीचर्स

news knowledge.eng_title: Android 15 Pixel update rumored to not launch until October
news knowledge.summary: A new report suggests that the Android 15 Pixel update may not be available until October, 'possibly even in the middle of the month.' According to Android Authority, the update is being withheld to improve its stability. This means that the Pixel 9 series and other phones may receive the September 2024 security patch with Android 14 next month. Android 15 Beta 4 was released in July, and Google has since moved on to testing QPR1, which is expected to be released in December. The delay is surprising, given that Android 15 is fairly stable, and the Pixel 9 series is shipping with Android 14, with some features from Android 15 backported. Android 15 will include features like Private space, a new Material You volume panel, and tweaks to the widgets picker.
news knowledge.title: Android 15 Pixel update rumored to not launch until October

news knowledge.eng_title: Elon Musk Offers X Employees a Chance to Earn Company Stock
news knowledge.summary: Elon Musk sent an email to X employees stating that they can opt for company stock if they demonstrate they deserve it. To receive the stock, employees must submit a one-page summary of their contributions to the social network. According to The Verge, the company is required to provide annual stock updates to employees, which were initially supposed to be distributed in April. However, SpaceX, the parent company of X, has yet to fulfill this promise. The last stock update for X employees occurred in October 2023, valuing the company at $19 billion. During this update, employees received retained stock at a price of $45 per share. Musk had previously acquired Twitter in October 2022 for $44 billion, then laid off around 75% of its staff after taking the company private.
news knowledge.title: Musk dijo a trabajadores de X que podrán optar por acciones de la compañía, si demuestran que lo merecen

news knowledge.eng_title: Elon Musk Offers X Employees Chance to Earn Stock if They 'Deserve It'
news knowledge.summary: Elon Musk sent an email to X employees stating that they can opt for company stock if they demonstrate they deserve it, according to The Verge. To receive the stock, employees must submit a one-page summary of their contributions to the company. This comes after Musk previously assured employees that they could receive stock regularly, similar to SpaceX employees, but has yet to follow through on this promise. The last stock update for X employees occurred in October 2023, valuing the company at $19 billion. During this update, employees received retained stock at a price of $45 per share. Musk acquired Twitter in 2022 for $44 billion and subsequently laid off around 75% of its staff.
news knowledge.title: Musk dice a los trabajadores de X que pueden optar a acciones si demuestran que lo merecen – El Nuevo Diario (República Dominicana)

news knowledge.eng_title: Musk Offers X Employees Chance to Earn Stock if They 'Deserve It'
news knowledge.summary: Elon Musk sent an email to X employees stating that they can opt for company stock if they demonstrate they deserve it, according to The Verge. To receive the stock, employees must submit a one-page summary of their contributions to the company. This comes after Musk previously promised employees that they could receive stock regularly, similar to SpaceX employees, but has yet to follow through on this promise. The last stock update for X employees occurred in October 2023, valuing the company at $19 billion. During this update, employees received retained stock at a price of $45 per share. Musk had previously taken Twitter off the stock exchange in October 2022, where it had been listed since 2013.
news knowledge.title: Musk dice a los trabajadores de X que pueden optar a acciones si demuestran que lo merecen

news knowledge.eng_title: US Space Tourist Posts Unseen Video From Orbital Journey As SpaceX Unveils New Mission
news knowledge.summary: Sian Proctor, a geoscientist and pilot who flew to space in 2021 as part of the Inspiration4 mission, has shared an unseen video from her trip. She expressed her excitement about the four astronauts who will get to view the planet from the Dragon spacecraft's cupola window, saying, 'Can't wait to see the @framonauts blast off over the polar regions with @SpaceX. The views from the cupola are going to be spectacular!' The new private flight, Fram2, will be the sixth mission launched by SpaceX and the first to take humans around the polar regions. The crew will spend 3-5 days in space to gather data and conduct experiments, while billionaire Jared Isaacman is preparing for another space mission, Polaris Dawn, on August 26.
news knowledge.title: US Space Tourist Posts Unseen Video From Orbital Journey As SpaceX Unveils New Mission

news knowledge.summary: AstraX version 0.5 is set to launch on August 14th, 2024. The update includes a fully functional spacecraft editor, allowing players to create, load, and save spacecraft and stations. The editor is a major addition to the game, and it's been released ahead of schedule. Other features in the update include better backgrounds that change depending on the galaxy and region, a reworked HUD with a sleeker compass and customizable gauges, and more. As the developer notes, 'Get creative!' with the new spacecraft editor and other features in AstraX 0.5.
news knowledge.title: Spacecraft Editor launch imminent! news

news knowledge.eng_title: SpaceX Crew-9 astronaut mission: Live updates
news knowledge.summary: SpaceX's Crew-2 mission successfully launched four astronauts to the International Space Station on April 23, 2024. The crew, consisting of NASA astronauts Shane Kimbrough and Megan McArthur, Japanese astronaut Akihiko Hoshide, and European Space Agency astronaut Thomas Pesquet, lifted off from Kennedy Space Center's Launch Complex 39A at 5:49 a.m. EDT (0949 GMT) aboard a Falcon 9 rocket and Crew Dragon spacecraft. The mission marked the second operational launch of the Commercial Crew Program. The Crew Dragon spacecraft successfully docked at the International Space Station on April 24 at 5:08 a.m. EDT (0908 GMT), making history as the first used SpaceX capsule to ferry astronauts to the orbiting lab. The crew will spend the next six months on the station, conducting scientific research and experiments. 'It was a great day,' said NASA astronaut Shane Kimbrough, commander of the Crew-2 mission, after the successful docking. The Crew-2 astronauts have now opened the final hatch between their spacecraft and the space station, and are preparing to enter the station. The mission is a significant milestone for SpaceX and NASA, demonstrating the reliability and effectiveness of the Crew Dragon spacecraft and the Falcon 9 rocket. The Crew-2 astronauts will spend the next six months on the International Space Station, conducting scientific research and experiments, and will return to Earth in October 2024. 'We are thrilled to have the Crew-2 astronauts on board the International Space Station,' said NASA Administrator, 'This mission is a testament to the hard work and dedication of the SpaceX and NASA teams.'
news knowledge.title: SpaceX Crew-9 astronaut mission: Live updates
